svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Energy use per capita vs. GDP per capita, 2015
Annual energy use per capita, measured in kilowatt-hours per person vs. gross domestic product (GDP) per capita,
Energy use per capita (kg oil equivalent)
Source: World Bank - World Development Indicators (WDI)
